thread.section_title: Universal Relocations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Universal Relocations | universalrelocations.com
thread.title: Mohammed Aadil
thread.title_full: Universal Relocations reviewed by Mohammed Aadil

author: Mohammed Aadil
title: Mohammed Aadil
text:
I had a chance to relocate with universal relocations from Chennai to Bangalore. I would define the experience of relocation with 'Universal relocations' as perfect & professional. Right from Move manager to co-coordinator and of course the guys who pack and move the package are very professional.
You can hire them and relax, rest is taken care by universal relocations.
Since i liked the service very much, i would like to even suggest universal relocations to enable 'SMS' or 'Email triggering' the event of movement of package. This would be very helpful in tracking the package and it will add feathers to 'universal relocations' services.
Overall very satisfied relocation experience:-)
